description:
Yoshihiro is sent to one of the partner shops that has changed managers three times already as immediate help. He tries to be manager-like and offers to help Miki, a high school student, who works there. As opposed to Yui and Shiori, Miki is messed up in other ways. In her own mind she is the perfect employee, never making any mistakes. Her self-image leaves her believing he is sexually harassing her do to her cuteness. Even though he hasn’t done anything, - yet…
Source: TMDB

titles.title: Cheeky and Outrageously Delusional Girl Miki: I Never Make Mistakes.
Miki, une fille dégradante • Une faute impardonnable
Namaiki Higai Bousou Musume Miki: Watashi, Machigaenai node.
ナマイキ被害暴想娘・美樹~私, 間違えないのでっ♥~
